trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_SEQ_00<tab>Raubahn has a personal favor to ask of you.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_TODO_00<tab>Deliver Raubahn's package to Pipin.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_TODO_01<tab>Follow Alphinaud.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Hakuro.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_TODO_03<tab>Report to Pipin.

TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>I have asked Urianger to look after Krile. He will keep her out of harm's way. Though, after what she has endured, her physical well-being may be the least of our worries...
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_URIANGER_000_015<tab>Worry not for her safety. Look thee to the east.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_RAUBAHN_000_020<tab>Right, then. I must go to my men. I shall be leading the first charge through the breach.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_021<tab>Then we shall head to the front.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_RAUBAHN_000_022<tab>Pipin has command of our artillery outside the gate. He'll not be hard to find.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_RAUBAHN_000_023<tab>Ah, but before you go, I have a final favor to ask.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_RAUBAHN_000_024<tab>Give this to my son. He will understand.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_RAUBAHN_000_025<tab>There's no need for explanations. When he sees it, he will know.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>'Twould seem our position here is secure...

TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_040<tab><var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) ((<var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>, Alphinaud. Hm? What is that you've got there?
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_041<tab>By the Twelve, this is...this is Tizona!
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_042<tab>The Bull of Ala Mhigo's legendary sword, forged from two cursed blades...

TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_043<tab>This sword is a symbol of everything my father fought to achieve. A weapon claimed on the bloodsands, and with it fortune and glory. Its flames consume the unworthy, but by fire was he reborn.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_044<tab>That he should bequeath it to me now...to carry on his legacy... Well, I shall endeavor to deserve it. But I'll be damned if this is his final battle!
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_050<tab>Once we begin, there will be no respite until it's over. Are you ready, my friends?
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_051<tab>Very well. Brace yourselves. This should be quite a specta─
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_FLAMEHERALD_000_052<tab>Vice Marshal! Vice Marshal! Imperial unit approaching from the north!
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_053<tab>Aiming to destroy our artillery, are they? How many?
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_FLAMEHERALD_000_054<tab>Total numbers unconfirmed. At least one squadron. But sir─they're wolfmen!
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_055<tab>Ferae Domitae. Bloody hells, that's all we need. Call up the Bloodsworn. Tell them to make ready─
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_056<tab>Marshal Tarupin, wait!

TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_057<tab>These “wolfmen” of whom you speak hail from Doma. They were <var 1A 02 /var>coerced<var 1A 01 /var> into fighting for the Empire─spirited away to a foreign land and told that if they disobeyed, the lives of their kin would be forfeit.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_058<tab>But their homeland has been liberated. They have no reason to continue serving their imperial masters!
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_059<tab>Ere you engage them in battle, I beseech you: grant us a moment to go and attempt to convince them to lay down their arms!

TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_060<tab>I am loath to gift our enemy more time to prepare...but if there is a chance that this conflict might be avoided, I suppose we must take it. Go then─but be quick.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_061<tab>We will, Vice Marshal.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_100_061<tab>With me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_065<tab>I dream of a day when people accept my words as truth without demanding that I prove them through feats of strength. But come, we must away.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_100_065<tab>Our scouts report that the wolfmen are advancing on our position from the north of the city. Convince them to retreat, or we will have no choice but to engage.

TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_066<tab>We will wait here for the Lupin to arrive. Steel yourself, my friend. Though I hope to resolve this without resorting to violence, it would seem wise to prepare for the worst...
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_110<tab>They come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_111<tab>(-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)You! Clear the road!
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_112<tab>Honorable warriors of Doma! My name is Alphinaud Leveilleur, and I come before you with news of great import─
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_100_112<tab>(-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)Silence, boy! You stand upon a battlefield. Begone, or be cut down!

TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_113<tab>Doma is free! Lord Hien has returned and driven Yotsuyu and the imperials from your lands! We were there─we helped him! There is no need for you to fight for Zenos!
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_114<tab>(-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)Lord Hien is dead, and you are a liar! What could a boy such as you do against magitek? Throw stones and spit curses!?
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_100_114<tab>(-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)Invoke my lord's name again at your peril. We will suffer no falsehoods!
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_200_114<tab>I speak only the truth! Put up your weapons, I beg of you! Let us speak as friends and not shed blood in vain!
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_300_114<tab>(-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)If your claims were true, we would gladly sheathe our blades and embrace as brothers.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_115<tab>(-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)But since they must surely be false, we would be traitors to accept! Our lives and those of our loved ones, forfeit!
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_116<tab>(-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)Words are air! You will prove the truth of your tale on the battlefield, or die in dishonor!
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_117<tab>(-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)You are no strangers to battle, that much is plain...
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_118<tab>I am the White. I am Hakuro! And I will be your opponent! Have at you!
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_070<tab>You fought with honor and restraint. You could have killed my men, and perhaps even me...but you did not. For this, I thank you.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_071<tab>Warriors brave and true. I pray you tell us of the battle for Doma's liberation.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_072<tab>We should be glad to do so...
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_073<tab>...Lord Hien, returned! Such joy this news brings us.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_074<tab>But for Lord Gosetsu to perish in the keep's collapse...to be taken from us by such treachery... There is no justice...
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_Q1_000_075<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_A1_000_076<tab>Eyes forward, Hakuro. He wished for no better death.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_078<tab>You knew him well. Aye, he would not suffer us to mourn with so much undone. And so we will not. Duty comes before all.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_079<tab>But I knew the man, and he would not suffer us to mourn on the eve of this great battle. Duty comes before all.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_100_079<tab>All Lupin shall know of Doma's liberation, and of your part in it.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_200_079<tab>When you breach the gates, we shall turn on the imperials as one. With fang and claw shall we rip open the throats of our masters. This the White swears.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_300_079<tab>Thank you. When our war is ended, I am certain that your lord will help us to return you all to Doma.

TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_400_079<tab>Such a curious thing, destiny, to see us meet with friends of Lord Hien in this distant corner of the world. But we shall not keep you─your day is not yet done.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_500_079<tab>Come, let us not keep our comrades waiting. We have a nation to liberate!
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_090<tab>Impeccable timing, those Domans! Come, comrades! The enemy's gate is down! <var 1A 02 /var>Forward<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_095<tab>You do not think he would actually wait until the last... No, no. Of course not. He's no Vidofnir.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_AYMERIC_000_100<tab>By the Fury... Did that man just bring down flying armor with a single stroke <var 1A 02 /var>in midair<var 1A 01 /var>?

TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_LUCIA_000_105<tab>The vice marshal's strategy for breaching the gates was most ingenious. A pity he did not account for the magitek armor─but to be fair, they did not account for the Domans either.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_RAUBAHN_000_106<tab>In entrusting Pipin with Tizona, I've entrusted him with command of the Flames. This time I fight not as a general, but simply a soldier.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Defeat the Ferae Domitae
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>Defeat Hakuro Whitefang
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_WOLFMAN_BATTLETALK_001_001<tab>If you die this day, then we shall know you for liars!
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_001_002<tab>Truly...? Must we fight to prove that we need not fight!?
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_BATTLETALK_102_001<tab>Until I am satisfied, we shall fight on! Give me your all!
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_002_002<tab>On your guard! His strength far exceeds that of his brethren!
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_BATTLETALK_104_001<tab>Hah! You have faced a samurai of Doma before! But I may yet surprise you...
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_BATTLETALK_105_001<tab>Is that all you can muster, Eorzeans!? Hold naught back!
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_005_002<tab>Such ferocity...! If he does not relent, we shall be forced to kill him!
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_BATTLETALK_105_003<tab>Enough. You are every bit the warriors you claim to be.
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_DEAD<tab>Confound it...
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_005_003<tab>...So be it. Moonstone Carbuncle! Come!
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_005_004<tab>Stand within the Carbuncle's wards! They will grant you strength!
